resources.string: Pods Companion by Domi04151309\nBased on OpenPods by Federico Dossena
Check your headphone\'s battery on your phone
To do that this app needs some permissions. Just grant them after you have clicked continue.
Play audio when in and pause audio when out automatically
Show a notification with the battery status when your headphones are connected
Show a pop-up with the battery status after your headphones are connected
There may be newer versions available on GitHub. This app is and always will be free software. Do not pay for this app.
This app is distributed under the terms and conditions of the GNU General Public License v3.0
I am not responsible for any damage to your device.
